relation: The BlackBerry® Social Networking Application Proxy generates system log files daily, and stores them in a subfolder in the logs folder. The subfolder's name takes the form YYYYMMDD. The name corresponds to the date on which the BlackBerry Social Networking Application Proxy creates the subfolder. You can use this property to specify the number of subfolders that the BlackBerry Social Networking Application Proxy creates. The BlackBerry Social Networking Application Proxy can create up to seven subfolders. The default location of the logs folder is C:\Program Files\Research in Motion\BlackBerry\SNAP\SP\snap_tomcat\logs.
logs general information that highlights the progress of an application
logs detailed information that you can use to debug an application
logs information about potentially harmful situations
logs information about error events that do not cause an application to stop running
logs information about severe error events that cause an application to stop running
pageTitle: Configuring system logging - Installation and Configuration Guide - BlackBerry Social Networking Application Proxy for Microsoft SharePoint Environments - 1.1
textBeforeTable: BlackBerry® Social Networking Application Proxy Administration Service, you can change the following system logging properties. Using the System logging properties Back To Top In the Service Management pane, click Restart Service. Under File Transfer Service, click Service Management. Click Submit Changes. In the System Log Settings pane, change the values for the properties as necessary. Under File Transfer Service, click Logging Management. BlackBerry® Social Networking Application Proxy Administration Service by typing the following URL in a web browser: https://<SNAP_server_name>:22446/snapconsole. Open the Change the system logging properties The log files for the BlackBerry Social Networking Application Proxy Administration Service are located at <drive>:\Program Files (x86)\Research In Motion\BlackBerry\SNAP\console\tomcat\logs. The log files for the client services are located at <drive>:\Program Files (x86)\Research In Motion\BlackBerry\SNAP\SP\snap_tomcat\logs. You cannot change the system logging properties for the log files for the BlackBerry Social Networking Application Proxy Administration Service or the client services.
